import React from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core' import { Navbar, Footer } from '..' import { Ubanner, Overview, Squareboxes1, Visit, Visit1 } from '../../molecules' import { homeproducts } from '../../molecules/PortfolioData' import { MainContainer } from '../../atoms' import { Homeapplication } from './Homeapplication' import { GridBlue } from '../../atoms' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ list: { background: '#003189', height: '50vh', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { height: 'fit-content', paddingBottom: '5%', }, }, box1: { width: '100%', paddingTop: '2%', border: 'none', }, UL: { font: 'normal normal normal 1rem Access', color: 'white', listStyle: 'inside', }, LI: { margin: '1% ' }, })) export function HomeautomationTemplate({ }) { const classes = useStyles() return (



) }
